snippet: Bidzina Ivanishvili, set to become Georgia’s next prime minister, has such a scant track record in public life that it is difficult to know how he will govern.
abstract: Bidzina Ivanishvili, who has been nominated to be Georgia's next prime minister, has such a scant track record in public life that it is difficult to know how he will govern; many Western leaders are apprehensive about what his nomination may mean.
lead_paragraph: Bidzina Ivanishvili, set to become Georgia’s next prime minister, has such a scant track record in public life that it is difficult to know how he will govern.

headline.seo: Georgian Leader Emerges as an Enigma
headline.main: Georgian Leader Emerges as an Enigma
headline.print_headline: Georgian Leader Emerges as an Enigma
